title: 多益單字-1
content:
1. tenant (n)承租人；occupant (n)居住者；renovation (n) 整修；notify (v)通知
The building manager notified the tenants that the renovation of the lobby would be postponed for a week. 

2. accommodate (vt)(建築物)容納(人)、迎合...條件；occupancy (n) (旅館的)入住率
   structure(=building)建築物(n)；enterprise (n) 企業、公司; commercial (adj)商業的 
   → commercial enterprise商業公司； occupation (n) 職業，(佔據→ occupy ，verb)
The new structure that is going up on Williams Street will accommodate hundreds of commercial enterprise.

3. BETWEEN 兩人之間 ；AMONG多人之間；suite 飯店套房
    cloakroom飯店旅館寄放衣物處；parlor旅館休息室；atrium室內中庭
    concierge旅館的綜合服務人員、看門人；room attendant客房服務員
sanitary 衛生的culinary 烹飪的；garnish cuisine裝飾菜餚；exquisite cuisine精緻菜餚
brew coffee 釀造，煮咖啡；utensil廚房用具；gourmet美食家;palate味覺
catering service 外燴服務；meal pass 用餐券；as a courtesy =  as a favor

4. brochure = little book小冊子 ；information desk 服務台;reception desk 接待櫃檯；counter (結帳、銀行)櫃台
There is a brochure on the information desk.

5. reception (n) 接待、歡迎會(→receptionist 接待員)；(旅館、公司、醫院)接待處
 The college held a welcome reception for the guest speaker.
 Visitors must register at the reception desk upon arrival.

6. reservation (n)預約 →make a reservation(=book)； 保護區
Please confirm your seating reservation prior ro arrival. 請在到達前確認您的座位預約.

Once you receive confirmation by e-mail, the reservation has been made.

St.Louis has been designed as a reservation for wildlife since 1985.
 St.Louis自1985年起被指定為野生動物保護區。
